publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5558 Stuart McMillan: Free Cook Schools in Inverclydeâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by Inverclyde Council and Stepwell Consultancy Ltd that they are to team up to introduce free cook schools throughout Inverclyde to reduce the amount of food thrown away; notes that the six cook schools will be held over the next two months, from January to March 2010, and are open to everyone; further notes that the classes will cover a variety of skills such as basic cookery expertise, how to make the most of your freezer and how to ensure that you get the perfect portion, and acknowledges that this is an excellent initiative that will give the people of Inverclyde an opportunity to improve their cooking skills and at the same time learn how to save food and money. Supported by: Robin Harper*, Anne McLaughlin*, Alasdair Allan*, Bob Doris*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-5558 Free Cook Schools in Inverclyde (lodged on 19 January 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Aileen Campbell*
